EmailTemplate.name: 07/04/2014 Primary ASA Term 3
EmailTemplate.subject: Primary ASA Term 3
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
British International School Kuala Lumpur Chartered By The British Schools Foundation
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Please find below a link to our list of ASA choices.
Primary ASA list: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/ccc?key=0Ap7vMviVDx-xdFMwRzZ4Z1V2NjhOeXFORDhUZGxLcmc&usp=sharing
Please use the following links to sign up for paid and non paid ASAs. These links will go live at 5pm today:
Registration Online (Non paid ASA): http://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/primary-non-paid-asas-term-3-registration-11082135967
Registration Online (Paid ASA). Please remember this must be paid by Wed, 23rd April: https://docs.google.com/a/britishschool.edu.my/forms/d/1p761ZM4jq5qrorZn-fh_2xaAbT5GdqL4qxqFSeEPFp8/viewform
For Non Paid ASAs you will receive an acknowledgement email. For Paid ASAs you won't, but finance will be informed and contact you.
Kind regards
Admin Team British International School Kuala Lumpur World Class Education
_________________________________________________________ Kuala Lumpur - Sao Paulo - Manila - Moscow - Nanjing - Tashkent - Pamplona - Marbella
